name: Neon Embrace
description:
A fiery halo of neon awaits the brave in this unforgiving arcade game about venturing deeper and deeper into the center of the ring.

Use one tap flap controls to try and keep yourself airborne while you jam out to one of 6 unique adaptive BGM tracks!

Play with your friends to see if you can get the highest score!

...if you're really determined, you might even get a chance to glimpse godhood...

---CREDITS---

Programming - Saulius "Biebrass" Vincevičius

Music - Vitas "VS" Svigaris and Nojus "HitManatee" Jakubauskas

Art - Ignas Puikis
